content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (18.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (21.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (24.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (27.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces at:
  - (16.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (19.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (22.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (25.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (28.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
- 5 Wooden chests at:
  - (15.5, 73.5)
  - (18.5, 73.5)
  - (21.5, 73.5)
  - (24.5, 73.5)
  - (27.5, 73.5)
- 5 Burner inserters at:
  - (15.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
  - (18.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
  - (21.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
  - (24.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items
  - (27.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Repeated placement errors (occurred 12 times)
- Cannot place burner-inserter at occupied positions (27.5, 72.5)
- Verify position is empty before placing new entities using get_entities_at()
- Remove existing entities before attempting new placements

### Fuel management issues (occurred 8 times)
- Failed to refuel furnaces and inserters due to insufficient coal
- Maintain adequate coal supply in inventory before attempting refuel operations
- Check fuel levels before attempting to insert more fuel

### Output blockage issues (occurred 7 times)
- Mining drills repeatedly blocked due to output space issues
- Clear output areas before starting mining operations
- Ensure proper belt/chest connections to receive mined materials

### Entity access errors (occurred 3 times)
- Attempted to access non-existent burner inserter at (24.5, 72.5)
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations using get_entity()

### Inventory management issues (occurred 2 times)
- Attempted to insert coal when none was available in inventory
- Check inventory levels before attempting insertion operations

### Assertion failures (occurred 3 times)
- Drill output blocked assertions failing repeatedly
- Address root
